title: Analysis of Barriers to Active Learning Classroom (ALC) Implementation and Collaborative Learning Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional methodologies and understanding of collaborative learning
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment for social domain professionals (medical/legal/technical) in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Analyze at least three cultural and organizational barriers encountered when introducing ALC in collaborative learning environments
Propose two department-level support strategies for the diffusion of ALC
Design at least one mobile-friendly activity that promotes collaborative learning in resource-constrained technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
